    An all-in-one AUTHENTIC Durban curry mix. Great for bunny chow or a delish curry and rice. Best with our lamb knuckles.

# Durban Masala Curry Powder

SKU: DURMASC

£5.50Price

Weight

60g

Quantity

Add to Cart

  * ## PRODUCT INFO

The real deal created from various family recipes passed down through
generations. An all in one spice powder allowing you to make the world
renowned Durban curry or Bunnychow.

  * ## DELIVERY & RETURNS

Order cut-off is 9am Monday to Friday, for next day delivery. Orders placed
after 9am on Friday, will be collected Monday for delivery Tuesday. Currently
shipping within England, Scotland and Wales (excluding Scottish Highlands and
Islands).



Our courier partner will endeavour to deliver the next day. You should receive
a notification from them confirming collection with options in the event you
won't be present for collection. In the event the undelivered package is
returned to the courier's depot and delivered the next day, you agree to
accept the delivery.



Unfortunately, we cannot accept returns due to the nature of the product.



Please contact us immediately should you have any issues with your product.
